article_title: Civilian Death Toll in Ukraine Rising, U.N. Report Says
article_text:
ZURICH—The civilian death toll in eastern Ukraine has risen dramatically in recent weeks as intense fighting that includes the use of artillery and rockets in towns and cities claims more lives, the United Nations said in a report published Friday.

On average, 36 people have been killed each day in fighting between forces loyal to Kiev and Russian separatists between July 16 and Aug. 17, the Office of the U.N.'s High Commissioner for...
